title: Holding on to Youth for Dear Life featuring Majandra Delfino
itunes:title: Holding on to Youth for Dear Life featuring Majandra Delfino
description:
Actress, singer, and almost scientist Majandra Delfino joins Kulap and SuChin to share everything she’s added to cart to keep her hair thicc, her skin plump, and her general facade looking extremely well rested. Ku and Su of course share their favorite youthful hacks, like wearing t-shirts for girls. 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

For a list and links to all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: Sponsor Links
